title: Forgotten Lives
description: What happens when your family wants nothing more to do with you and you are left for dead?Clare Evens is on her own. Her work-obsessed family no longer gives her the time of day, and after months of enduring neglect, she decides she's had enough. With only a small bag filled with clothes, her ID, and the clothes on her back, Clare boards a plane to Paris, hoping to start her life over far away from her family.Lucas Manners is a local Parisian trying to avoid his own disturbed home situation. He, too, seems to be searching for something in life, but doesn't know where to look to find it. Fate seems to smile on Lucas when he runs into his reason for living in the street one morning. Literally. She introduces herself as Clare.Clare and Lucas continue to get to know one another, hoping that this is their golden opportunity to start a new life. Preferably together. But their families have other plans.What is worth fighting harder for? Family? Or love? And what would you be willing to sacrifice in order to keep that bond strong?When you've lost everything can one person change you forever?(Due to sexual content and language, this book is recommended for 17+ Adult Contemporary Romance).
author: Jeremy Chenevert
